con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions artifactId="ServiceCalculateService" targetNamespace="http://loyalty.droolscours/" xmlns:ns1="http://cxf.apache.org/bindings/xformat" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://loyalty.droolscours/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://loyalty.droolscours/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:complexType artifactId="ticket"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="amount" type="xs:float"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="customer" type="tns:customer"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="date" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="id" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="loyaltyCard" type="tns:card"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" artifactId="ticketLines" nillable="true" type="tns:ticketLine"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType artifactId="customer"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="birthDate" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="customerID" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="gender" type="tns:gender"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="maritalName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="artifactId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="surName" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType artifactId="card"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="cartType" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="customer" type="tns:customer"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="artifactId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="number" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType artifactId="ticketLine"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element artifactId="lineNumber" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="lineTotal" type="xs:float"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="op" type="tns:ligneop"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="price" type="xs:float"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="product" type="tns:product"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="productID" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element artifactId="quantity" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="ticket" type="tns:ticket"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="ticketID" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element artifactId="valid" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType artifactId="ligneop"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="montantReduction" type="xs:float"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="nomOP" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType artifactId="product"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="id" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="artifactId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="price" type="tns:price"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="provider" type="tns:provider"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType artifactId="price"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="currency" type="tns:currency"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="price" type="xs:float"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType artifactId="provider"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="country" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="artifactId" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType artifactId="gender"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Mr"/> <xs:enumeration value="Mrs"/> <xs:enumeration value="Miss"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType artifactId="currency"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Euro"/> <xs:enumeration value="Dollar"/> <xs:enumeration value="Yen"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:element artifactId="calculate" type="tns:calculate"/> <xs:complexType artifactId="calculate"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="arg0" type="tns:ticket"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element artifactId="calculateResponse" type="tns:calculateResponse"/> <xs:complexType artifactId="calculateResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" artifactId="return" type="tns:ticket"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message artifactId="calculateResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:calculateResponse" artifactId="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message artifactId="calculate"> <wsdl:part element="tns:calculate" artifactId="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType artifactId="IServiceCalculate"> <wsdl:operation artifactId="calculate"> <wsdl:input message="tns:calculate" artifactId="calculate"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:calculateResponse" artifactId="calculateResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding artifactId="ServiceCalculateServiceSoapBinding" type="tns:IServiceCalculate"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation artifactId="calculate"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input artifactId="calculate"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output artifactId="calculateResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service artifactId="ServiceCalculateService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:ServiceCalculateServiceSoapBinding" artifactId="ServiceCalculatePort"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/simpleWebApp/calculateService"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>
